database module¶

database.py

This module handles all database interactions, including CRUD operations and database backup.

Functions: - create_connection - create_tables - add_student - get_students - update_student - delete_student - add_instructor - get_instructors - update_instructor - delete_instructor - add_course - get_courses - update_course - delete_course - add_registration - get_student_courses - remove_registration - backup_database

database.add_course(course)[source]¶

Adds a course to the database.

Parameters:

course (Course) – The course to add.

database.add_instructor(instructor)[source]¶

Adds an instructor to the database.

Parameters:

instructor (Instructor) – The instructor to add.

database.add_registration(student_id, course_id)[source]¶

Adds a registration entry for a student and a course.

Parameters:

  • student_id (str) – The ID of the student.

  • course_id (str) – The ID of the course.

database.add_student(student)[source]¶

Adds a student to the database.

Parameters:

student (Student) – The student to add.

database.backup_database(backup_path)[source]¶

Backs up the database to a specified file path.

Parameters:

backup_path (str) – The path to save the backup.

database.create_connection()[source]¶

Creates a connection to the SQLite database.

Returns:

SQLite connection object.

Return type:

sqlite3.Connection

database.create_tables()[source]¶

Creates the necessary tables in the database if they do not exist.

database.delete_course(course_id)[source]¶

Deletes a course from the database.

Parameters:

course_id (str) – The ID of the course to delete.

database.delete_instructor(instructor_id)[source]¶

Deletes an instructor from the database.

Parameters:

instructor_id (str) – The ID of the instructor to delete.

database.delete_student(student_id)[source]¶

Deletes a student from the database.

Parameters:

student_id (str) – The ID of the student to delete.

database.get_courses()[source]¶

Retrieves all courses from the database.

Returns:

List of Course objects.

Return type:

list of Course

database.get_instructors()[source]¶

Retrieves all instructors from the database.

Returns:

List of Instructor objects.

Return type:

list of Instructor

database.get_student_courses(student_id)[source]¶

Retrieves all courses a student is registered in.

Parameters:

student_id (str) – The ID of the student.

Returns:

List of course IDs.

Return type:

list of str

database.get_students()[source]¶

Retrieves all students from the database.

Returns:

List of Student objects.

Return type:

list of Student

database.remove_registration(student_id, course_id)[source]¶

Removes a registration entry for a student and a course.

Parameters:

  • student_id (str) – The ID of the student.

  • course_id (str) – The ID of the course.

database.update_course(course)[source]¶

Updates a course’s information in the database.

Parameters:

course (Course) – The course with updated information.

Updates an instructor’s information in the database.
